annotation.spannedText: 42 yo M with unknown past medical history presents with apparent intentional drug overdose, with likely phenytoin and TCAs, now s/p intubation for airwary protection. . # Altered mental status: Resolved, and appears to be related to poly-drug overdose. TCA positive on Serum tox, but no EKG changes. Seizure less likely given dilantin level. - Appreciate Toxicology input - Crystalloid IVFs - Trend daily lytes - Continuing to monitor on tele . # Suicideal ideation: Per report patient was attempted to hurt himself by taking a "handful of pills". - F/u with psychiatry - Pt awake and conversant now - Per psych, Pt can be Section 12 when medically stable . # FEN: On regular diet - 500cc bolus for mild tachycardia (pt feels thirsty) # Prophylaxis: Subcutaneous heparin # Access: peripherals x2 # Communication: None. No response at family phone numbers. Will call family per patent s request today # Code: Full presumed # Disposition: call out to medicine before bed availability on psychiatry floor. ICU Care Nutrition: Glycemic Control: Lines: 22 Gauge - [**2181-3-15**] 06:48 PM 20 Gauge - [**2181-3-16**] 08:00 AM Prophylaxis: DVT: Stress ulcer: VAP: Comments: Communication: Comments: Code status: Full code Disposition:
